Info.Title: Haider
Info.Writer: William Shakespeare (based on the play "Hamlet" by), Basharat Peer (screenplay), Vishal Bhardwaj (screenplay), Vishal Bhardwaj (dialogue)
Info.Actors: Tabu, Shahid Kapoor, Shraddha Kapoor, Kay Kay Menon
Info.Plot: A young man returns to Kashmir after his father's disappearance to confront his uncle, whom he suspects of playing a role in his father's fate.
